db:abstract.db:para: The GeoFlickr example shows how to use the user's current position to fetch local content from a web service.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = geoflickr
QT += qml quick network positioning SOURCES += qmllocationflickr.cpp
RESOURCES += \ flickr.qrc
OTHER_FILES += flickr.qml \ flickrcommon/* \ flickrmobile/*
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/positioning/geoflickr INSTALLS += target
